About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am 29 years old and am an ambitious person looking for a first job as a Junior Frontend Developer I started my adventure with programming by searching for information on blogs, facebook groups, youtube, and online courses, after a short period of time I realized that creating websites and applications fascinates me very much and I would like to develop in this direction, because I would like to do something that develops me and teaches me where each new day can teach me something new. Currently, I spend my free time after work on exercises and learning pure JavaScript and Vue.js. I do not want to stay in place, I am looking for my first job. I want to acquire new skills, expand my knowledge so that in the future I can create really interesting, great-looking, and most importantly functional websites and applications. I will be very grateful for the opportunity to work as a junior frontend developer.
